texto: (that in turn is comprised of system elements) before a complete set of system elements can be defined with confidence (Figure 2). In this manner, the appropriate system life cycle processes are applied recursively to a system‐of‐interest to resolve its structure to the point where understandable and manageable software system elements can be implemented (created, adapted, acquired, or reused).
